And the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Speak<S>1696</S> unto all the congregation<S>5712</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and say<S>559</S> unto them, Ye shall be holy<S>6918</S>: for I the LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S> am holy<S>6918</S>.
Ye shall fear<S>3372</S> every man<S>376</S> his mother<S>517</S>, and his father<S>1</S>, and keep<S>8104</S> my sabbaths<S>7676</S>: I am the LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S>.
Turn<S>6437</S> ye not unto idols<S>457</S>, nor make<S>6213</S> to yourselves molten<S>4541</S> gods<S>430</S>: I am the LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S>.
And if ye offer<S>2076</S> a sacrifice<S>2077</S> of peace offerings<S>8002</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, ye shall offer<S>2076</S> it at your own will<S>7522</S>.
It shall be eaten<S>398</S> the same day<S>3117</S> ye offer<S>2077</S> it, and on the morrow<S>4283</S>: and if ought remain<S>3498</S> until the third<S>7992</S> day<S>3117</S>, it shall be burnt<S>8313</S> in the fire<S>784</S>.
And if it be eaten<S>398</S> at all<S>398</S> on the third<S>7992</S> day<S>3117</S>, it is abominable<S>6292</S>; it shall not be accepted<S>7521</S>.
Therefore every one that eateth<S>398</S> it shall bear<S>5375</S> his iniquity<S>5771</S>, because he hath profaned<S>2490</S> the hallowed thing<S>6944</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>: and that soul<S>5315</S> shall be cut off<S>3772</S> from among his people<S>5971</S>.
And when ye reap<S>7114</S> the harvest<S>7105</S> of your land<S>776</S>, thou shalt not wholly reap<S>3615</S> the corners<S>6285</S> of thy field<S>7704</S>, neither shalt thou gather<S>3950</S> the gleanings<S>3951</S> of thy harvest<S>7105</S>.
And thou shalt not glean<S>5953</S> thy vineyard<S>3754</S>, neither shalt thou gather<S>3950</S> every grape<S>6528</S> of thy vineyard<S>3754</S>; thou shalt leave<S>5800</S> them for the poor<S>6041</S> and stranger<S>1616</S>: I am the LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S>.
Ye shall not steal<S>1589</S>, neither deal falsely<S>3584</S>, neither lie<S>8266</S> one<S>376</S> to another<S>5997</S>.
And ye shall not swear<S>7650</S> by my name<S>8034</S> falsely<S>8267</S>, neither shalt thou profane<S>2490</S> the name<S>8034</S> of thy God<S>430</S>: I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Thou shalt not defraud<S>6231</S> thy neighbour<S>7453</S>, neither rob<S>1497</S> him: the wages<S>6468</S> of him that is hired<S>7916</S> shall not abide<S>3885</S> with thee all night until the morning<S>1242</S>.
Thou shalt not curse<S>7043</S> the deaf<S>2795</S>, nor put<S>5414</S> a stumblingblock<S>4383</S> before<S>6440</S> the blind<S>5787</S>, but shalt fear<S>3372</S> thy God<S>430</S>: I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Ye shall do<S>6213</S> no unrighteousness<S>5766</S> in judgment<S>4941</S>: thou shalt not respect<S>5375</S> the person<S>6440</S> of the poor<S>1800</S>, nor honour<S>1921</S> the person<S>6440</S> of the mighty<S>1419</S>: but in righteousness<S>6664</S> shalt thou judge<S>8199</S> thy neighbour<S>5997</S>.
Thou shalt not go<S>3212</S> up and down as a talebearer<S>7400</S> among thy people<S>5971</S>: neither shalt thou stand<S>5975</S> against the blood<S>1818</S> of thy neighbour<S>7453</S>: I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Thou shalt not hate<S>8130</S> thy brother<S>251</S> in thine heart<S>3824</S>: thou shalt in any wise<S>3198</S> rebuke<S>3198</S> thy neighbour<S>5997</S>, and not suffer<S>5375</S> sin<S>2399</S> upon him. <sup>and: or, that thou bear not sin for him</sup>
Thou shalt not avenge<S>5358</S>, nor bear any grudge<S>5201</S> against the children<S>1121</S> of thy people<S>5971</S>, but thou shalt love<S>157</S> thy neighbour<S>7453</S> as thyself<S>3644</S>: I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Ye shall keep<S>8104</S> my statutes<S>2708</S>. Thou shalt not let thy cattle<S>929</S> gender<S>7250</S> with a diverse kind<S>3610</S>: thou shalt not sow<S>2232</S> thy field<S>7704</S> with mingled seed<S>3610</S>: neither shall a garment<S>899</S> mingled<S>3610</S> of linen and woollen<S>8162</S> come<S>5927</S> upon thee.
And whosoever<S>376</S> lieth<S>7901</S> carnally<S>2233</S> <S>7902</S> with a woman<S>802</S>, that is a bondmaid<S>8198</S>, betrothed<S>2778</S> to an husband<S>376</S>, and not at all<S>6299</S> redeemed<S>6299</S>, nor freedom<S>2668</S> given<S>5414</S> her; she shall be scourged<S>1244</S>; they shall not be put to death<S>4191</S>, because she was not free<S>2666</S>. <sup>betrothed: or, abused by any: Heb. reproached by (or, for) man</sup> <sup>she shall: or, they, etc: Heb. there shall be a scourging</sup>
And he shall bring<S>935</S> his trespass offering<S>817</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, unto the door<S>6607</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, even a ram<S>352</S> for a trespass offering<S>817</S>.
And the priest<S>3548</S> shall make an atonement<S>3722</S> for him with the ram<S>352</S> of the trespass offering<S>817</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> for his sin<S>2403</S> which he hath done<S>2398</S>: and the sin<S>2403</S> which he hath done<S>2398</S> shall be forgiven<S>5545</S> him.
And when ye shall come<S>935</S> into the land<S>776</S>, and shall have planted<S>5193</S> all manner of trees<S>6086</S> for food<S>3978</S>, then ye shall count<S>6188</S> the fruit<S>6529</S> thereof as uncircumcised<S>6188</S> <S>6190</S>: three<S>7969</S> years<S>8141</S> shall it be as uncircumcised<S>6189</S> unto you: it shall not be eaten<S>398</S> of.
But in the fourth<S>7243</S> year<S>8141</S> all the fruit<S>6529</S> thereof shall be holy<S>6944</S> to praise<S>1974</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> withal. <sup>holy: Heb. holiness of praises to the LORD</sup>
And in the fifth<S>2549</S> year<S>8141</S> shall ye eat<S>398</S> of the fruit<S>6529</S> thereof, that it may yield<S>3254</S> unto you the increase<S>8393</S> thereof: I am the LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S>.
Ye shall not eat<S>398</S> any thing with the blood<S>1818</S>: neither shall ye use enchantment<S>5172</S>, nor observe times<S>6049</S>.
Ye shall not round<S>5362</S> the corners<S>6285</S> of your heads<S>7218</S>, neither shalt thou mar<S>7843</S> the corners<S>6285</S> of thy beard<S>2206</S>.
Ye shall not make<S>5414</S> any<S>3793</S> cuttings<S>8296</S> in your flesh<S>1320</S> for the dead<S>5315</S>, nor print<S>5414</S> any marks<S>7085</S> upon you: I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Do not prostitute<S>2490</S> thy daughter<S>1323</S>, to cause her to be a whore<S>2181</S>; lest the land<S>776</S> fall to whoredom<S>2181</S>, and the land<S>776</S> become full<S>4390</S> of wickedness<S>2154</S>. <sup>prostitute: Heb. profane</sup>
Ye shall keep<S>8104</S> my sabbaths<S>7676</S>, and reverence<S>3372</S> my sanctuary<S>4720</S>: I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Regard<S>6437</S> not them that have familiar spirits<S>178</S>, neither seek<S>1245</S> after wizards<S>3049</S>, to be defiled<S>2930</S> by them: I am the LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S>.
Thou shalt rise up<S>6965</S> before<S>6440</S> the hoary head<S>7872</S>, and honour<S>1921</S> the face<S>6440</S> of the old man<S>2205</S>, and fear<S>3372</S> thy God<S>430</S>: I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And if a stranger<S>1616</S> sojourn<S>1481</S> with thee in your land<S>776</S>, ye shall not vex<S>3238</S> him. <sup>vex: or, oppress</sup>
But the stranger<S>1616</S> that dwelleth<S>1481</S> with you shall be unto you as one born<S>249</S> among you, and thou shalt love<S>157</S> him as thyself; for ye were strangers<S>1616</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>: I am the LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S>.
Ye shall do<S>6213</S> no unrighteousness<S>5766</S> in judgment<S>4941</S>, in meteyard<S>4060</S>, in weight<S>4948</S>, or in measure<S>4884</S>.
Just<S>6664</S> balances<S>3976</S>, just<S>6664</S> weights<S>68</S>, a just<S>6664</S> ephah<S>374</S>, and a just<S>6664</S> hin<S>1969</S>, shall ye have: I am the LORD<S>3068</S> your God<S>430</S>, which brought you out<S>3318</S> of the land<S>776</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>. <sup>weights: Heb. stones</sup>
Therefore shall ye observe<S>8104</S> all my statutes<S>2708</S>, and all my judgments<S>4941</S>, and do<S>6213</S> them: I am the LORD<S>3068</S>.
